def_cn: （平分后要决出胜负的）附加赛
def_en: A playoff is an extra game which is played to decide the winner of a sports competition when two or more people have got the same score.

def_cn: （常规赛季之后的）季后赛
def_en: You use playoffs to refer to a series of games between the winners of different leagues, to decide which teams will play for a championship.
